library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)

sales <- read_csv("data/sales.csv")
products <- read_csv("data/products.csv")

data <- left_join(sales, products, by = "product_id")

data |> 
  group_by(region) |> 
  summarise(total_sales = sum(amount)) |> 
  ggplot(aes(region, total_sales)) +
  geom_col()
